title: System For Reporting Police Killings Unreliable, Study Finds
teaser: A new Bureau of Justice Statistics study confirms that the annual count of people killed by police in America is low. Analysis shows that the true number is probably twice as high as officially reported, but there's still no reliable system to keep track of it.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
